title: How to Make Penne Alfredo With Bacon and Broccoli

steps.title: Cook the pasta to al dente
steps.content: Cook the pasta to al dente and drain completely.

steps.title: Heat the butter and heavy cream together in a small saucepan.
steps.content: Heat the butter and heavy cream together in a small saucepan. Stir until the butter is completely melted. Add the cheese and spices and continue stirring until the mixture is creamy and the cheese is melted.

steps.title: Place the bacon in a large skillet and cook until crisp.
steps.content: Place the bacon in a large skillet and cook until crisp. Add the broccoli and continue cooking for about 5 minutes.

steps.title: Add the pasta and bacon/broccoli mixture in a large serving bowl.
steps.content: Add the pasta and bacon/broccoli mixture in a large serving bowl.

steps.title: Pour the sauce into the bowl and thoroughly combine.
steps.content: Pour the sauce into the bowl and thoroughly combine.

steps.title: Serve warm or chilled.
steps.content: Serve warm or chilled. You can also add sliced grilled chicken as a meat addition.
